content: That's a great question! I've been thinking about that, and I want to make sure the new pigpen has plenty of space for the pigs to roam and play. I'm planning to include some mud pits, as pigs love to roll around in the mud, and maybe even some tunnels or obstacles for them to explore. I've also been considering adding some fruit trees or bushes to provide shade and a snack for the pigs. What do you think about those ideas?
